exercises.name: Push-ups
instructions: Start in plank position with hands shoulder-width apart
Keep your body in straight line from head to heels
Lower chest to ground while keeping elbows close to body
Push back up to starting position
Maintain steady breathing throughout
exercises.tips: If too difficult, start with knee push-ups
exercises.video_description: Proper push-up form demonstration for beginners

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squats
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Lower body as if sitting back into chair
Keep chest up and knees behind toes
Go down until thighs parallel to ground
Push through heels to return to start
exercises.tips: Keep weight on heels, not toes
exercises.video_description: Perfect squat technique for building leg strength

exercises.name: Plank Hold
instructions: Start in push-up position on forearms
Keep body straight from head to heels
Engage core muscles tightly
Hold position without sagging hips
Breathe normally throughout hold
exercises.tips: Start with shorter holds and build up time

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
instructions: Start standing with feet together, arms at sides
Jump feet apart while raising arms overhead
Jump back to starting position
Maintain steady rhythm
Land softly on balls of feet
exercises.tips: Keep movements controlled and land softly
exercises.video_description: Cardio jumping jacks for weight loss

exercises.name: Forward Lunges
instructions: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart
Step forward with right foot
Lower body until both knees at 90 degrees
Push back to starting position
Repeat with left leg
exercises.tips: Keep front knee over ankle, not past toes
exercises.video_description: Leg toning lunges with proper form

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Start in plank position
Bring right knee toward chest
Quickly switch legs
Continue alternating at fast pace
Keep core engaged throughout
exercises.tips: Maintain plank position, don't let hips rise

exercises.name: Burpees
instructions: Start standing, drop into squat
Place hands on ground, jump feet back to plank
Do push-up (optional)
Jump feet back to squat position
Jump up with arms overhead
exercises.tips: Modify by stepping back instead of jumping

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
instructions: Lie on back with knees bent
Feet flat on ground, arms at sides
Squeeze glutes and lift hips up
Form straight line from knees to shoulders
Lower back down slowly
exercises.tips: Squeeze glutes at top, don't overarch back

exercises.name: Single Leg Deadlifts
instructions: Stand on one leg with slight knee bend
Hinge at hips, lower torso toward ground
Extend free leg behind for balance
Return to standing by driving hips forward
Switch legs after completing reps
exercises.tips: Focus on hip hinge movement, not knee bend

exercises.name: Pistol Squats
instructions: Stand on one leg, extend other leg forward
Lower down into single-leg squat
Keep extended leg straight and off ground
Go as low as possible while maintaining form
Push through heel to return to start
exercises.tips: Use assistance or box to build up strength

exercises.name: Plyometric Push-ups
instructions: Start in push-up position
Lower chest to ground
Push up explosively so hands leave ground
Land softly and immediately go into next rep
Maintain control throughout movement

exercises.name: Jump Squats
instructions: Start in squat position
Lower into deep squat
Explode up jumping as high as possible
Land softly in squat position
Immediately go into next rep
exercises.tips: Focus on soft landings to protect knees

exercises.name: Side Plank
instructions: Lie on side with forearm on ground
Stack feet and lift hips off ground
Create straight line from head to feet
Hold position engaging core
Switch to other side
exercises.tips: Keep hips up and body straight

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
instructions: Sit on edge of chair or bench
Place hands beside hips, fingers forward
Slide forward off edge, support weight on arms
Lower body by bending elbows
Push back up to starting position
exercises.tips: Keep elbows close to body, don't flare out
